mapper.select: select pSeq, pName from product where 1=1 order by pSeq asc
mapper.insert: insert into orders ( oDate, oReceiver, oStateCd, oReceiverTel, oReceiverAddr, user_uSeq )values ( now(), #{oReceiver}, 1, #{oReceiverTel}, #{oReceiverAddr}, #{user_uSeq} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM orders a left join ordersProduct b on a.oSeq = b.orders_oSeq left join product c on b.product_pSeq = c.pSeq left join vender d on c.vender_vSeq = d.vSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.oSeq=#{oSeq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders a WHERE 1=1 AND a.oStateCd = 2
AND a.oDate BETWEEN #{shDateStartDB} AND #{shDateEndDB}
AND a.oSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.oReceiver LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
ORDER BY a.oSeq DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders a WHERE 1=1 AND a.oStateCd = 3
AND a.oDate BETWEEN #{shDateStartDB} AND #{shDateEndDB}
AND a.oSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.oReceiver LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
ORDER BY a.oSeq DESC
